Standard.Name: The Singular Case of the Midshipman 1.2.1.1.2.2.1

English.Text: A brutal approach, but one delivering quick results. It seems the midshipman was preparing to whistle-blow unauthorised smuggling below deck, and was killed for it. The ringleaders threatened others with a similar fate if they didn't keep quiet. The culprits are unceremoniously shot, and the vulgar matter is over.
